name: zhime
description: Chrome OS IME,Browser Extension IME UI,VScode Simple IME.

scripts.test: env TS_NODE_PROJECT=./test/tsconfig.test.json mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register --extension ts --recursive './test/**/*.ts'
scripts.shuangpin: cd shuangpin && npm install && cd googlepinyin && npm install && cd .. && npm run build
scripts.librime: cd librime && npm run librime && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:deps: rimraf dist && npm run clone:submodule && npm run shuangpin && npm run librime
scripts.update:shuangpin: cd shuangpin && git checkout wasm-decoder && git pull && cd .. && git add shuangpin && git commit -m "Update shuangpin submodule to latest."
scripts.update:librime: cd librime && git checkout master && git pull && cd .. && git add librime && git commit -m "Update librime submodule to latest."
